cat > internal/agents/manager_test.go << 'EOF'
package agents

import (
	"context"
	"testing"
	"time"

	"github.com/stretchr/testify/assert"

	"agentic-go/pkg/types"
)

func TestNewManager(t *testing.T) {
	manager := NewManager()
	assert.NotNil(t, manager)
	assert.Len(t, manager.ListAgents(), 1) // Default Go agent
}

func TestGoAgent(t *testing.T) {
	agent := NewGoAgent("Test Agent")
	
	assert.NotEmpty(t, agent.GetID())
	assert.Equal(t, "Test Agent", agent.GetName())
	assert.NotEmpty(t, agent.GetCapabilities())
	
	message := types.AgentMessage{
		ID:        "test-message",
		Role:      "user",
		Content:   "Hello, agent!",
		Timestamp: time.Now(),
	}
	
	response, err := agent.ProcessMessage(context.Background(), message)
	assert.NoError(t, err)
	assert.True(t, response.Success)
	assert.NotNil(t, response.Data)
	assert.Equal(t, agent.GetID(), response.AgentID)
}
EOF
